original: Elmgreen and Dragset, a collaborative duo consisting of Michael Elmgreen (born 1961) from Denmark and Ingar Dragset (born 1968) from Norway, have been working together since 1995. Their artistic practice explores the interplay between art, architecture, and design. They employ institutional critique, social politics, performance, and architectural elements, often reconfiguring everyday objects and situations with wit and subversive humo
